# supportsCombination(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a category supports the given attribute combination.

## Declaration

```swift
func supportsCombination(_ attributes: [any CapturedRoomAttribute]) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **attributes**: An array of attributes to check whether the object supports them.

## Discussion

Only compatible attributes can pair up in association with a 3D model, for example, with the [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/ModelProvider] function [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/ModelProvider/setModelFileURL(_:for:)-8xio]. These [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/ModelProvider] functions for `setModelFileURL` and `modelFileURL` throw [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/ModelProvider/Error/attributeCombinationNotSupported] if no object category supports all of the attributes in the arguments to their call.

## Determining supported attributes

- **supportedAttributeTypes**: Defines the attributes types compatible with a particular object category.
- **supportedCombinations**: An array of supported attributes that differs by category.
